name: BLED NAVALNY
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
During the opening of one of the headquarters Blat Navelny was attacked by some dwarf with a gas cylinder, as it turned out that the gas is not simple, but hallucinogenic. Navalny understood this when he saw colorful mountains, trees and zombie politicians running towards him. Our hero can only escape, shoot fire at zombie politicians and watch the drug addiction.
Features:
-You can be a Russian politician who is fighting corruption and visiting his head
-Discover what's in the mind of addicts and what they see
-Notible multi-colored world
-The developer himself did this game under the grass, based on real events
-Games - Run and Gun - the essence is simple - run and shoot
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
